channel.title: Rick Norlock
channel.description: Recent news about Rick Norlock, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Cramahe Now
item.description:
MP announces final mobile office dates
Rick Norlock, Member of Parliament for Northumberland-Quinte West announced last week the final Mobile Offices for the riding. These mobile events allow constituents a chance to chat directly with MP Norlock and access the same services currently found ...

item.description:
MP Rick Norlock Announces Final Locations for Mobile Offices

item.title: Mentioned by Quinte News
item.description:
Federal cash for Hastings Waterfront Festival
Northumberland-Quinte West MP, Rick Norlock announced today, the festival will get $5,400 dollars to put towards this year's event, August 16th to the 18th. Organizers say this year's Hasting's Waterfront Festival will include antique boats and cars, heritage ...

item.title: Mentioned by Northumberland Today
item.description:
Norlock sets up Grafton mobile-office session
Northumberland MP Rick Norlock's latest mobile-office round will bring him to Grafton next week. Norlock has set up a variety of such sessions throughout the riding over the summer, allowing constituents a chance to talk with the MP personally and to access ...

item.title: Mentioned by NorthumberlandView.ca
item.description:
MP Rick Norlock Announces Funding for Hastings Waterfront Festival
(Hastings, ON) – Rick Norlock, Member of Parliament, Northumberland-Quinte West, today announced funding for the Hastings Waterfront Festival to celebrate the local arts, culture and heritage of Hastings, Ontario. “One of the ways in which communities ...

item.title: Mentioned by Northumberland Today
item.description:
Norlock unaware of fake-Braille flyers
Northumberland MP Rick Norlock said this week he is unaware of a flyer sent out by several other MPs which outlines steps being taken to remove obstacles to employment, but fails to raise the dots on the Braille portion of the message. Reports surfaced last ...

item.title: Introduced legislation
item.description:
Private member's bill C-501
An Act respecting a National Hunting, Trapping and Fishing Heritage Day

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Another super northern day. Special Olympic Walk with OPP friends. Day topped off with more good walleye fishing. Matt up to 4 skunks!!!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: After a busy week....sorry too few twitters, we are in Red Lake Ont. with Family. Had a chance to celebrate with Greg Rickford!!!!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Further to my last tweet ......please donate if you can!!!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: On Tuesday attended the "Ground Breaking " ceremony for the Afghanistan Repatriation Memorial" campaign launch. A fitting memorial.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Had an informative and rewarding dinner with the Greenwood Coalition .......thanks volunteers and staff!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Touching re-dedication of the Camp Mirage Monument with Minister MacKay at The Nation Air Force Museum.
